TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DesignTimeTemplateParser extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DesignTimeTemplateParser class is meant for use only within a designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.UI.Control ParseControl(class System.Web.UI.DesignTimeParseData data) cil managed

Docs.param: Information used in creating the parser.
Docs.summary: Parses and builds one control at design time.

Docs.param: Information used in creating the parser.
Docs.summary: Parses and builds one or more controls at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder ParseTheme (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host, string theme, string themePath);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder ParseTheme(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host, string theme, string themePath) cil managed

Docs.param: The path to the theme, which is used in creating the parser.
Docs.summary: Parses a theme at design time.
Docs.returns: The from the parser that parsed the theme.
Docs.exception: An error occurred while parsing the theme.
